original_title: 親友の妹に至近距離で囁き誘惑され続けて7日目、親友不在中に僕は理性を失って何度もSEXしまくった…
overview: My best friend's little sister comes to stay for 7 days at the house where I share a room with my best friend. Cute looking little sister. She's actually a little devil..."Excuse me." I hear a voice from the bathroom, so when I go there, "Where's the replacement soap?" Even if you tempt me to enjoy my reaction, I will only be impatient with insertion! And on the 7th day, I finally couldn't stand it anymore and inserted it into my sister! I had sex many times while my best friend wasn't there.
title: My Best Friend's Sister Whispered In My Ear And Tempted Me Into Spending 7 Days At Their House While My Friend Was Away, Making Me Lose My Mind And Fucking Her Countless Times... Mia Nanasawa
